desc: Explore the City of Light's iconic landmarks, such as the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre Museum.
Experience Tokyo's vibrant culture and unique cuisine, and visit famous sites like the Shibuya Crossing and the Tokyo Skytree.
Relax on Bali's beautiful beaches, hike in its lush rice paddies, and explore its ancient temples.
See the bright lights of Times Square, visit the Statue of Liberty, and take in a Broadway show in the Big Apple.
Experience the vibrant culture and stunning natural beauty of Rio de Janeiro, from the iconic Christ the Redeemer statue to the beautiful Copacabana beach.
Visit the iconic Sydney Opera House, stroll along Bondi Beach, and take in the stunning views from atop the Sydney Harbour Bridge.
Take in the natural beauty of Cape Town, from Table Mountain to the stunning beaches along the Atlantic Ocean.
Explore the stunning architecture of Antoni Gaudí, including the Sagrada Familia and Park Güell, and sample delicious tapas in the lively streets of Barcelona.
Take in the stunning views of the Aegean Sea from the whitewashed buildings and blue-domed churches of Santorini, and enjoy the delicious local cuisine.
Experience the vibrant culture of Cuba in Havana, from the classic cars to the salsa music and delicious cuisine.
